step_feedback.feedback: Good job performing the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion.  Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize rib expansion and oxygen flow.
While you attempted the circular motion, focus on maintaining a smoother, more controlled movement throughout the four repetitions. Ensure both shoulders are moving equally and consistently.

The range of motion in step 3 seems inconsistent.  Try to maintain a consistent circular motion throughout all four repetitions, ensuring the movement originates from the shoulder blades and not just the arms.

exercise_summary: The patient demonstrated a good understanding of the shoulder roll exercise. Step 1 was performed well, showing good control and range of motion. However, steps 2 and 3 showed inconsistencies in the circular motion and maintaining a consistent range of motion throughout the repetitions.  Focus on smoother, more controlled movements and consistent engagement of the shoulder blades.
